name: Isoland 2: Ashes of Time
detailed_description:
Isoland 2: Ashes of TIme is the second installment of the Isoland series from Pudding Games, creators of Mr. Pumpkin Adventure, and Little Triangle.
Who are you? Why are you on this mysterious island? With these questions in mind, explore various locations on the island such as a factory, a ferry terminal, rocket, and lighthouse. Talk to several inhabitants of the island to gain clues that will help you solve puzzles. Use a time machine to uncover the secrets and discover the past of this strange place.

short_description: Isoland 2: Ashes of Time is a puzzle game with a fascinating non-linear story, charming 2D hand-drawn art, numerous challenging puzzles, and unique twists. Besides numerous sci-fi references and easter-eggs hidden throughout the game, you’ll find things aren’t quite the same second time you play through the story. Come discover the lost history of this mysterious island.
